html: In September 2018, the U.S. unemployment rate fell to 3.7 percent for the first time since 1969. For perspective, the last time the unemployment rate was this low, Neil Armstrong walked on the moon, the Beatles released “Abbey Road, ” and I was a student at @UNTnews.

html: Aid can be a powerful motivator. As we determine appropriations for FY 2019, all Members of Congress should consider the foreign aid we'll agree to send to Honduras, El Salvador, Guatemala and even Mexico – the countries whose children are fleeing to the U.S. for their safety.

html: It is simply irresponsible - it is inhumane - for the American government to incentivize anyone to subject themselves or their children to the perilous journey to our border.
text: It is simply irresponsible - it is inhumane - for the American government to incentivize anyone to subject themselves or their children to the perilous journey to our border.

html: We know coyotes & traffickers use our rhetoric to prey on the disadvantaged, encouraging families to put their children on top of La Bestia to travel to the U.S. When we say – or even suggest – that children could receive amnesty at the border, we put innocent lives at risk.

- 1918: U.S. Marines turn the tide of WWI at the Battle of Belleau Wood

html: The @FAANews Reauthorization passed today includes my amendment to prevent drones in our National Air Space from being unlawfully weaponized. As we consider overall aviation safety, we must protect the public from unauthorized armed drones.https://bit.ly/2Fm68LP

html: Technology and safety must advance together. My amendment to prevent a person, unless authorized by the FAA, from operating a drone in the National Air Space that is equipped or armed with a dangerous weapon has been included in the FAA Reauthorization.https://youtu.be/k6TdbvO0TiI
text: Technology and safety must advance together. My amendment to prevent a person, unless authorized by the FAA, from operating a drone in the National Air Space that is equipped or armed with a dangerous weapon has been included in the FAA Reauthorization.https://youtu.be/k6TdbvO0TiI

html: Each March 30, we mark #DoctorsDay and honor the many doctors who care for America's patients. Working alongside fellow physicians to help shape health care policy is a privilege. Thank you for devoting your lives to keeping us well.

html: Statement from Dr. Burgess’ Spokesperson Emma Thomson: “I have spoken to Dr. Burgess and thankfully he was not injured in the train accident. Following the accident, he helped to administer aid to victims - like he does during any emergency. We hope to share more info soon."
